channel.title: After i killed the monster.. its suppose to drop but its says connection lost
channel.description:
well... [list] [li]i placed the drop in item3 and npchandlerli]
[ul][li]i placed the monster in the autospawn[/li][/ul]
but now if i kill the monster.. it says connection lost and it keeps dieing for 10 seconds...
does someone know how to fix the connection lost because of the drops? also does someone know how to not let it die 10 seconds first but more like 1 second? (i lost the tut for the second)
